name: Cursed Ghoul
description:
One day, while walking in the forest, the hunter encounters a ghost and the ghost sends it to the dungeon for some unknown reason.

The hunter also tries to get out of the dungeon.

HOW TO PLAY ?

W-A-S-D = MOVEMENT

MOUSE = FİRE

Keep your mouse on the top while watching the cinematics, you don't want to see anything wrong.. :)
